t: Whale meat - Wikipedia
s: May 4, 2025 - As previously mentioned, different cuts of whale meat have specialised names. The belly meat, in the striped bellows-like underbelly of baleen whales "from the lower jaw to the navel", is called unesu (ウネス（畝須）) and is known for being made into whale bacon.

t: Amazon removes whale meat products from Japanese site | Whaling | The Guardian
s: October 31, 2021 - Public outcry forces online retailer to ditch products including whale bacon, whale jerky and canned whale meat ... Environmental groups are claiming a major victory after the online retailer Amazon removed whale meat products from its site in Japan.

t: Animal rights groups protest Amazon sales of whale bacon, endangered species meat
s: February 22, 2012 - Animal rights groups are calling on Seattle- based Amazon.com to stop selling jerky, bacon and other products made from whale meat on its Japanese web site.
